StoryText: My boss offers me 4 hours of overtime today but my husband and I were supposed to watch a movie tonight.
Question: What do I do?

OptionText.Text: Take the overtime and tell my husband I’ll be home late
Turn down the overtime and head home to watch the movie
Suggest to my husband we watch the movie tomorrow and take the overtime
Ask my boss to just do 2 hours of overtime so I don’t get home too late

OptionResult.Result: My boss is glad I take the overtime and it’s good for my career but my husband is really mad.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: Things are looking really good at my job and with my boss but things are rocky with my husband since I cancelled our plans.

OptionResult.Result: My husband is happy we do our movie night together and we have a great time.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: There will probably be plenty of overtime in the future, me and my husband had a movie night planned and I’m glad I kept our plans, we had a fantastic night!

OptionResult.Result: My husband is more than happy with this decision and my boss is happy with me too, but I forget to get myself dinner.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: My husband was alright with changing the night and was happy with me for communicating that with him, things are looking good at work too but I am starving! I forgot to eat!

OptionResult.Result: My boss gets mad and says it’s 4 hours or nothing, so I take the 4 hours but my husband gets upset with me for ditching him.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: I didn’t realize my boss would get so angry with me so I just did the full 4 hours. My husband got mad at me too so I guess everyone just hates me... but it’s good for my career... I guess?
